column2: "I've heard about how great your abilities are almost to the point of disgust."
"Not that I doubt it, but you understand that I want to confirm it with my own eyes, right?"
"That's the reason for this time attack. You'll race against time until your objective is achieved."
"Show me what you can do within the time limit, and complete it with a rating you deserve. Do it on the easiest level."
"You'll leave your record and get a reward. I don't think you have anything to lose."
